connector.description:
Upsert Composite List of sObjects in Salesforce. 

The body received must contain List of JSON SObjects to insert/update inside the records attribute, for example: 

`{"records" : ["attributes" : {"type" : "KameletSinkSObject__c"},"ExtId__c" : "1","Name__c": "Ziauddin", "City__c": "Bhopal"], ["attributes" : {"type" : "KameletSinkSObject__c"},"ExtId__c" : "2","Name__c": "Shaikh", "City__c": "Bhopal"] }`

camel.kamelet.salesforce-composite-upser.name: camel.kamelet.salesforce-composite-upsert-sink.sObjectName
camel.kamelet.salesforce-composite-upser.description: The type of the Salesforce object. Required if using a key-value pair. Example: Contact

camel.kamelet.salesforce-composite-upser.name: camel.kamelet.salesforce-composite-upsert-sink.sObjectIdName
camel.kamelet.salesforce-composite-upser.description: The Field Name of the External ID of the Salesforce object. Required if using a key-value pair.
